Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
tags: Aviation Maintenance Stand Deployable and Spares
full_summary:
==========================

**Aviation Maintenance Stands Deployable and Spares**

**Notice Reference:** cb-66-18055362
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-247716/B
**Publication Date:** 11 March 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** 9 April 2024, 2:00 PM EST
**Contact Information:**

* Name: Lucas Baxter
* Email: lucas.baxter@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (819) 939-6835

**Tender Information:**

The Department of National Defence is seeking a contractor to provide aviation maintenance stands deployable and spares. The required items are:

* Aviation Maintenance Stand Deployable: 4 units
	+ GSIN: N4940
	+ NSN:
	+ Part No.: NSCM/CAGE:
* Spare Wheels for Aviation Maintenance Stand: 4 units
	+ GSIN: N2530
	+ NSN:
	+ Part No.: NSCM/CAGE
* Spare Hydraulic, electrical and/or pneumatic system for Aviation Maintenance Stand: 1 unit
	+ GSIN: N2590
	+ NSN:
	+ Part No.: NSCM/CAGE

The delivery address is:

Department of National Defence, CC130J WSM Det Trenton, Building 52, Room 208D, 52 North Star Drive – PO box 1000 Stn Forces, Astra, Ontario, K0K 3W0

**Tender Requirements:**

* Documents may be submitted in either English or French.
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* The tender is to be submitted electronically in the required format.

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is open to suppliers who are certified under the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA
